name: react-native-android-wifi-updated
description: A react-native implementation for viewing and connecting to Wifi networks on Android devices. Forked from Ferran Reventos <devstepbcn@gmail.com>, https://github.com/devstepbcn/react-native-android-wifi at version 0.0.38. This includes fixes for the forceWifi method that avoids a bug encountered in Android 6.0.0.
author: Parker Bond <parkertest007@gmail.com>
